lead_paragraph: THE British Ats -- equivalent of the Wacs -- soon make friends with their American colleagues, freshly arrived in Great Britain. They are frequent visitors to the American barracks, and there are exchanges of magazines, books and slang.
abstract: Wacs and ATS groups in GB exch slang expressions

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: RECREATIONAL AND SOCIAL ACTIVITIES (MILITARY AND MERCHANT MARINE)
